articles.title: Russia reports fierce fighting as African peace mission leaves empty-handed - Reuters.com
articles.description: Russia reported fierce fighting on Sunday on three sections of the front line in Ukraine, a day after hosting an African peace mission that failed to spark enthusiasm from either Moscow or Kyiv.
articles.content: June 18 (Reuters) - Russia reported fierce fighting on Sunday on three sections of the front line in Ukraine, a day after hosting an African peace mission that failed to spark enthusiasm from either … [+5207 chars]

articles.title: Russia reports fierce fighting a day after hosting African peace mission - Hindustan Times
articles.description: A Russian-installed official said Ukraine had recaptured Piatykhatky, a village in the southern Zaporizhzhia region, and were entrenching themselves. | World News
